message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase it for $750,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and providing you with a fair deal. I believe this is an opportunity that should not be overlooked, given the high value you place on this product. I look forward to your positive response.
